item.title: About
item.description:
Hey, there!

Im Israel Jes煤s, Cloud Engineer at Nike, specialized in building scalable, secure, and cloud-native solutions on Amazon Web Services (AWS). I currently work within Retail Technology environments, designing and operating cloud platforms that support large-scale, business-critical systems.

My experience spans cloud architecture, serverless and event-driven systems, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and MLOps practices. Ive led the transition of machine learning workloads from research to production, designed cloud platforms for real-time data processing, and applied Clean Architecture principles to build maintainable and resilient systems across diverse industries.
